subject: Hpatics don't work on LMU
description_text:
Hi,
I've currently bought the simsonn plus X pedals, with the haptic VAM pro.
The haptics don't work on Le Mans Ultimate. It seems it doesn't get the
telemetry from LMU.
Do you know if there is a fix for that.
Thank you
*Nuno Tiago Goulart*

*tel: +351 962 480 021*
*email: t.goulart@gmail.com <t.goulart@gmail.com>*

conversations.body_text: Hi，Tiago Goulart，     Please try the following steps:    Go to Settings → Update and update to SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2;    After the update, restart the software and update your pedal firmware;    Confirm the firmware versions are CPU1: 2.0.5 / CPU2: 2.0.4;    Then test again to see if the issue persists.    ​  https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
